text: opened in Kōchi, Kōchi Prefecture, Japan, in 2017. Located beside the main gate of Kōchi Castle, the collection tells the history of the Tosa Domain and of the Prefecture, and comprises the 67,000 items formerly preserved, researched, and exhibited at the Tosa Yamauchi Family Treasury and Archives. ==See also== * Kōchi Prefectural Museum of History * List of Historic Sites of Japan (Kōchi) * Tosa Domain * List of Cultural Properties of Japan - paintings (Kōchi) * List of Cultural Properties of Japan - historical materials (Kōchi) ==References== ==External links== * Kōchi Castle Museum of History Category:Museums in Kōchi Prefecture Category:Museums established in 2017 Category:2017 establishments in Japan Category:Kōchi
title: Kōchi Castle Museum of History
